general:
Hello! I'm Jasper Lefever, a 21-year-old Full Stack Developer from Belgium with a passion for technology and for creating innovative solutions to complex problems. I studied Computer Science at the University College of Ghent, where I mastered the fundamentals of both front-end and back-end development.

As a creative problem solver, I'm always on the lookout for new ways to improve and innovate. I'm dedicated to continuously learning and growing as a developer, excited about where my skills will take me next. I'm also an open person, so feel free to reach out if you have any questions or just want to chat. One of my greatest strengths is my determination: if I set my mind to something, I will accomplish it no matter what it takes.
philosophy: I believe in the transformative power of technology to turn ideas into reality. My goal is to create impactful solutions that make a difference in society and improve people's lives. I strongly value collaboration and teamwork and thrive in environments that foster creativity and innovation.
personal-interests: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring the outdoors, hitting the gym, or engaging in any active pursuit. These activities help me stay balanced both physically and mentally, allowing me to bring my best self to every project I undertake.
